mapper.update: update gd_download set createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ftype = #{ftype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, createTime, deleted, detail, ftype, logo, `name`, orderNo, `type`, address from gd_download
